text: Enosis Neon Paralimni B.C. (in Greek: Ένωσις Νέων Παραλιμνίου), is a Cypriot professional basketball club based in Paralimni, Cyprus. The club competes in the Cypriot League. ==History== The club was founded in 1936. ==Players== ===Current roster=== {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%" |- style="background-color: crimson; text-align: center; color: cyan;" | colspan="2" | E.N.
